description: Detect the use of Windows Defender to download payloads Author: Matthew Matchen. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Defender Download Activity
query: ((process.command_line:*MpCmdRun.exe* OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Microsoft\ Malware\ Protection\ Command\ Line\ Utility") AND (process.command_line:*DownloadFile* AND process.command_line:*url*))
